channel.title: Basic Question
channel.description: Hey umm im trying to make my game private wich means i want it to be like moparscape, single player, when you download the moparscape client you connect to your localhost and i just want it to be basicaly offline, any ideas.. Thanks.

item.title: Basic Question
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:3, topic:367467”]There is a simpliest solution ever.

Dont tell anyone you made the server.

Or you can , just dont tell your IP adress.[/quote]
He has a point,
I did think this,but i wanted to go all nooby and explain it XDXD

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Question
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

There is a simpliest solution ever.

Dont tell anyone you made the server.

Or you can , just dont tell your IP adress.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Question
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Okai,so you want it to be just you who connects to it
Well that is simple
Im talking about delta client,but on others clients its pretty simple to
So you need to go into your gui.java. (or whereever else your ip is located)
You need to change the ip to 127.0.0.1, IT MIGHT BE ANOTHER ‘0’. If that doesnt work add a zero,maybe take one out,you will get it edventually. Anyway,that ip is the localhost which means basically only you can connect to it,
Hope this helps

Read full topic
